spiritsExplanation:
The workout is classified primarily as 'Structured & Disciplined' with a score of 0.9, due to the "Day 1" designation in the title, which suggests a systematic series approach. The description further emphasizes a progressive training series suitable for different levels, indicating a methodical design and disciplined structure. 

I assigned 'High-Energy & Intense' a score of 0.7 because the workout is a full-body, no-equipment session focused on building muscle and increasing strength, indicating a strong emphasis on effort and intensity. The comments also mention substantial progress and sweating during the workout, supporting the high-energy categorization.

Finally, 'Flow & Rhythm' receives a score of 0.4, as there is some emphasis on flexibility and music integration ("Music by Epidemic Sounds"), suggesting rhythm and continuity. However, it has a lower score because the primary focus of the workout is more on structure and intensity rather than smooth, rhythmic motion.
